summary: An ordinance approving amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2050 for the improvement of West 62nd Street, from 17th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest; by regarding, curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20562 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
